Function Documentation

int spot_image_tiff_read ( double **  img,
int *  nx,
int *  ny,
char *  filename,
double  scale,
double  offset 
)

Read RGBA tiff image from file as greyscale image (the red channel of the RGBA image is read).

Note:
Memory for img is allocated herein and must be freed by the calling routine.
Parameters:
[out]imgGreyscale image read from tiff file.
[out]nxDimension of image in x direction.
[out]nyDimension of image in y direction.
[in]filenameName of file to read tiff image from.
[in]scaleScale factor to apply to image pixels (8 bit values read from tiff file are mapped to (val-offset)*scale.
[in]offsetOffset to apply to image pixels (8 bit values read from tiff file are mapped to (val-offset)*scale.

Definition at line 27 of file sopt_image.c.

References SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK().

Referenced by main().

int spot_image_tiff_write ( double *  img,
int  nx,
int  ny,
char *  filename,
double  scale,
double  offset 
)

Write RGBA tiff image to file from greyscale image (the greyscale image is written to the red, green and blue channels of the RGBA image).

Parameters:
[in]imgGreyscale image written to tiff file.
[in]nxDimension of image in x direction.
[in]nyDimension of image in y direction.
[in]filenameName of file to write tiff image to.
[in]scaleScale factor to apply to image pixels (8 bit values written to tiff file are transformed by (img-offset)*scale.
[in]offsetOffset to apply to image pixels (8 bit values written to tiff file are transformed by (img-offset)*scale.
